title: Not Sure How to Write Your Personal Statement? Don't Miss the Personal Statement Workshop at ...
text: ( Source : Los Angeles Valley College ) Get help on how to write your personal statement for UC applications at the ' Personal Statement ' Workshop on October 20 at 5:30 p.m. in the Career / Transfer Center . The LAVC Career/Transfer Center ( CTC )
